name: Tickets, Please!
description:
Click on a passenger to see their ticket color. Click on a track to select the color of train that you would like to call. Select a passenger, and then click a number (1-6) on their selection panel or press 1-6 on your keyboard to send them to their appropriate platform. Press the Smiley face on a passenger's selection panel in order to reset their patience at a cost of $50 of the passenger's money. Click on a closed platform to unlock it for $3000. More colors and passengers will show up as the days go by.

Your time as a station manager is up when you reach $0 or 7 days!
